const BashboardMenu = (props)=>{ const {activeTab,setActiveTab} = props; return (
{setActiveTab('Home')}} >
Home
{setActiveTab('Groups')}}>
Groups
{setActiveTab('Settings')}}>
SettingsSettings
{setActiveTab('Invite')}}> Invite
{setActiveTab('Logout')}} >
Logout
); } export default BashboardMenu;
